g3dsys.control

Interface IndexIterator


  • public interface IndexIterator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getD()
      Get the number of dimensions
      boolean hasNext()
      See if there are more indices
      boolean isLazySafe()
      Indicates whether it is appropriate to simply scale the original boundary lines when in 'large box' mode.
      int[] next()
      Get the next set of indices
      void reset()
      Resets iteration; should be called before use
      void setSize(int[] size)
      Sets the size of each dimension; in general they should all be the same size.

    • Method Detail

        Get the number of dimensions
        Returns:
        returns the number of dimensions

        Resets iteration; should be called before use

        boolean hasNext()
        See if there are more indices

        int[] next()
        Get the next set of indices
        Returns:
        returns the next indices

      • setSize

        void setSize(int[] size)
        Sets the size of each dimension; in general they should all be the same size.
        Parameters:
        size - an array of sizes to set

      • isLazySafe

        boolean isLazySafe()
        Indicates whether it is appropriate to simply scale the original boundary lines when in 'large box' mode.
        Returns:
        returns whether the boundary is lazy-safe
